action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell (for herself and Mr. Upton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To expand the unique research initiatives authority of the National Institutes of Health.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Advancing Cutting Edge Research Act or the ACE Research Act.
Section 402(n)(1) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 282(n)(1)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking the period and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: high impact cutting-edge research that fosters scientific creativity and increases fundamental biological understanding leading to the prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of diseases and disorders, or research urgently required to respond to a public health threat.
